name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Chinese Consulate General in San Francisco lodged solemn representations to the US over the attack on the embassy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 9, outside the Tiancheng Real Estate sales office in Cangzhou, Hebei, owners were thrown water and driven away by security guards while sitting in protest to protect their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video of car crashing into Chinese Consulate in San Francisco

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shenzhen Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision released the results of the investigation into the grandfather of "Arctic Catfish" Zhong Gengci
Zhong Gengci was not loyal and honest to the party, colluded with others to resist the organization's review many times, took the opportunity to make money, engaged in profit-making activities in violation of regulations, worked part-time without approval, used his position to seek benefits for others, and illegally accepted money and property from others.
It was decided to expel him from the party, confiscate his illegal gains, and determine his retirement benefits according to the second-level clerk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
When meeting with a delegation of U.S. congressmen, Chinese President Xi Jinping said that we have a thousand reasons to improve Sino-U.S. relations and no reason to damage them. 
This is a step backward for the growing anti-U.S. trend in China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: What is the retirement benefit of a second-level clerk? Can anyone tell me what I know?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, trucks were not allowed to board the Lianhuo Expressway in Zhengzhou. The security guard said that there were officials on the expressway and he was afraid that they would kill him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, a Xiaohongshu netizen revealed that the Wuhou District in Sichuan refused to issue passports to children of Tibetan descent without even looking at the documents and directly said that it could not be processed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Rat is back
On October 10, a student from North China University of Technology revealed that he found what looked like a rat head in the school cafeteria, but the store said it was beef.
The school has now notified that students are blocked from spreading the news, and has banned various online media such as TikTok from spreading the news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 10, the media reported that the upcoming Xiaomi 14 will be equipped with Xiaomi's self-developed MiOS, and this system is exclusively for domestic use. Overseas, Xiaomi will continue to adapt to the MIUI15 update.
This news has caused concerns among some Mi fans, who are worried that the domestic special version of MiOS will be separated from the Google framework and embedded in the national anti-fraud system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 10, TVB reported.
At present, at least 3 Chinese were injured in Hamas' terrorist attacks
A worker from Beijing Construction Engineering said that he met Hamas terrorists on Saturday morning. After he claimed to be Chinese, he was ignored and shot directly. He was shot twice and rescued by an Israeli helicopter. The whereabouts of his two co-workers are unknown.
Another Chinese was shot by Hamas while driving. Two people were shot. After getting off the car, they revealed their Chinese identity and stopped firing. They were later rescued by the Israeli army.
At present, at least 4 Chinese workers are missing
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that it has immediately activated the consular protection emergency mechanism to coordinate the safety protection of Chinese citizens and called on local Chinese citizens to pay close attention to the local situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 10, Shenzhen, Guangdong
A reporter was interviewing normally on the street when street workers tried to snatch his camera.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I think I saw this episode in 1966.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: But it seems that this topic has been quite popular in recent years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Israel notified Egypt that it would bomb any convoy of aid trucks that might be heading from Egypt to Gaza. 
Earlier, the King of Jordan said he would work with Egypt to deliver humanitarian aid to the Gaza Strip.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

content:
Just now, someone jumped off a building at China University of Political Science and Law
The reason is unknown

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the vast majority of netizens believe that the punishment is too light.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen asks for help
I bought a copy of Kahneman's "Thinking Fast and Slow" in traditional Chinese, and wanted to see the difference between the traditional and simplified versions.
When I opened it, I found that the difference was that a paragraph under page 288 of the traditional version was taped off.
I hope netizens who have this book can tell me what this paragraph is about.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 10, China.com led a rumor about Israel using white phosphorus bombs against Gaza, which has now reached the eighth place on Weibo's hot search list, continuing to guide the hatred of the Chinese people.
This rumor appeared on Twitter a day ago, but was debunked because it used a picture taken in Syria seven years ago.
China's official media cleverly used "data pictures" to avoid the risk of spreading rumors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China.com is a key central news website.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, North China University of Technology has issued an announcement to terminate the operating contract with the canteen catering company.

content:
